price: 30. « C’est ce qu’a décrété ton Seigneur, répondirent-ils, c’est Lui le Sage et l’Omniscient. »
arabic: قَالُواْ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū kadhāliki qāla rabbuki innahu huwa al-ḥakīmu al-ʿalīmu
